label: Day Trips
description: Full-day escapes to beaches, islands, and mountain towns outside Rio.

faqs.question: How far are day trips from Rio?
faqs.answer: Most destinations are 2-3 hours each way.

faqs.question: Are meals included?
faqs.answer: Meals are typically not included unless specified.

tours.name: Island Escape: Ilha Grande by Private Speedboat
tours.description: Embark on an exclusive private speedboat journey around the pristine tropical paradise of Ilha Grande.

tours.name: Búzios: Brazil's Riviera (23 Beaches in One Day)
tours.description: Discover the sophisticated beach resort of Búzios, famous for its Mediterranean atmosphere and over 20 stunning beaches.

tours.name: Petrópolis: Imperial Palaces & Mountain Escape
tours.description: Escape to the mountains and explore Brazil's imperial history in Petrópolis, the summer residence of Brazilian emperors.
